text: There is a lot better, more expensive than normal and kebab is not up to par, I do not mind paying 8.00$ for a glass of arak on the condition you put Arak in it. Kebab, Kafta and kibbe, there are cheaper and better out there.
Food was good but overpriced and slow service.

Well, I visited this place tonight and it was a horrible experience! Everyone was smoking and I could hardly breath it's not pleasant when your trying to have dinner.  The service of this restaurant is very slow I waited over 2 hours after the appetizer to get the main entree. However I did find the entertainment pleasant and the belly dancer as well! I wouldn't return to this restaurant even though the food was ok but atmosphere was horrible.
